title: Mob Psycho 100: Dai Ikkai Rei toka Soudansho Ian Ryokou - Kokoro Mitasu Iyashi no Tabi
synopsis: The staff of the Spirits and Such Consultation Office—Arataka Reigen, Shigeo "Mob" Kageyama, Ritsu Kageyama, Katsuya Serizawa, and the spirit Ekubo—head to the Zebra Prefecture for a relaxing hot spring vacation. Their all-expenses-paid trip is sponsored by the owner of the Ibogami Hot Springs, who has asked Reigen to investigate claims of paranormal activity in the area.
voices: ['Sakurai, Takahiro', 'Itou, Setsuo', 'Ootsuka, Akio', 'Matsuoka, Yoshitsugu', 'Irino, Miyu', 'Hoshino, Takanori']
